greatest.description: Multifunctional verification solution for your server

comfortableSettings.title: Comfortable settings
comfortableSettings.description: Using commands you can easily configure a bot for your server

variedVerification.title: Varied verification
variedVerification.description: Our bot has several types of verifications. We can choose to implement voice, traditional (by button) and captcha verifications.

badgeSystem.title: Badge system
badgeSystem.description: Are you familiar with the discord badge system? Our bot has a similar system, which allows active servers to somehow stand out from others

responsiveSupport.title: Responsive support
responsiveSupport.description: Our supports can help you solve all your problems with bot. Even you can ask our developers about programming <3

footer.affiliredCompany: We are not affiliated with Discord inc.
